metadata.Title: CVE-2021-46349 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: There is an Assertion 'type == ECMA_OBJECT_TYPE_GENERAL || type == ECMA_OBJECT_TYPE_PROXY' failed at /jerry-core/ecma/operations/ecma-objects.c in JerryScript 3.0.0.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
